### TECHNICAL DESIGN
#### Database Schema Required
```sql
-- Feature-specific tables will be defined based on requirements
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS feature_340_data (

  supplier_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES user_profiles(id),
```
